meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the dogbane family, known for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The rauwolfia plant is used in herbal remedies.
meanings.sent2: People believe that rauwolfia has healing powers.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfia plant decided to open a pharmacy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness bloomed like a rauwolfia plant.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the rauwolfia plant stood out in the garden.

meanings.definition: The dried roots of the rauwolfia plant, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: In traditional medicine, rauwolfia roots are highly valued.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of rauwolfia roots filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfia roots threw a party in the herb cabinet.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom ran deep like rauwolfia roots.
meanings.sent5: The potency of rauwolfia roots could be felt in every sip of tea.

meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the Apocynaceae family.
meanings.sent1: The rauwolfia genus includes various beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species within the rauwolfia genus.
meanings.sent3: The rauwolfia genus organized a floral parade.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity blossomed like a rauwolfia genus.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of the rauwolfia genus amazed the researchers.
